mapper.select: select gm_id, gm_total, gm_reserve, gm_date , b.team_name as team_away , c.team_name as team_home , d.std_name from test_game as a inner join test_team as b inner join test_team as c inner join test_stadium as d on a.team_id = b.team_id and a.team_id2 = c.team_id and a.std_id = d.std_id
